channel.title: [New Class] The MadMan
channel.description:
Alright, so i have this idea to bring in a new neutral, it would be almost identical as the fool, but this one would have to get himself killed at night.
The idea is to copy the fool's mechanism, but you'd rather try to get yourself killed at night and not during day ! If you succeed, the identity of your murderer as well as his class will be displayed to everyone the next day ! This could slow down the "Random kill lol" at night and force people to think more about their actions...
Goal of the class : Get executed at night. Abilities : The old fool's fireworks There could be only either fool or MadMan, but never both in the same game !
